title: Silent Guilt
description: When Shannon Taylor entered his world, Nicholas Lockhart found everything he always wanted, but knew he could never have.  Neither of them knew how connected their pasts were nor the secrets that lay waiting to tear them apart. Shannon and Nick fell hard and fast for one another.  Nick struggles with his own demons and guilt that heâ€™s been carrying around for the past ten years. When he learns what happened to Shannon all those years ago and knowing the part he played in it, he feels responsible. Can he let it go and forgive himself?  Or, will his silent guilt consume him and make him lose the two things that have become his his life, his world, his love...his everything?  ***This is the conclusion of Nick and Shannon's story, but not the end of the series nor the end of these two characters. They will make appearances throughout the series.***
author: N.E. Henderson
